name: Southern Colorado Flight Professionals
about: Southern Colorado Flight Professionals is a premier flight school located at the Pueblo Municipal Airport in Southern Colorado. We offer comprehensive flight instruction and aircraft rental services, catering to aspiring pilots in the region. Our training programs include spin training for CFI applicants, ensuring our students receive specialized and advanced training. With a focus on safety and competence, our instructors provide personalized guidance to help students achieve their aviation goals. Our facility is conveniently located just a short drive from town, making it an ideal choice for those seeking to learn to fly in a supportive and professional environment. We are committed to helping you take to the skies with confidence and skill.
services:
["Biennial Flight Review
Ground School
Instrument Proficiency Check
Intro Flight
Private Pilot
Instrument"]
